history.proof: intros p0 p1 n H. strivial use: pl_product_0.

tactic: apply pl_product_0 with (p0 := p0) (p1 := p1) (a := pl_essence p0 p1).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable a (possible names are: p0 and p1).

original: intros p0 p1 n H. unfold pl_produit_1. apply pl_product_0 with (p0 := p0) (p1 := p1) (a := pl_essence p0 p1). apply H.
